alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 108 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Hammond to near Redwood to 8 miles southeast of Wellesley Island State Park. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Redwood, Theresa, Plessis, Oxbow, and Muskellunge Lake. This includes Interstate 81 near exit 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Radar has estimated that some areas have received nearly two inches of rain. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
